100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗

sentences.english: Politicians use the "right" making money, black and white confluence, Living and sharing interests.
sentences.chinese: 政治人物藉“权”捞钱，黑白合流，利益共生互享。

sentences.english: Pollution caused by combined sewer overflows (CSOs) in wet weather has gained much attention.
sentences.chinese: 合流系统雨天溢流污染问题在全世界受到广泛关注。

sentences.english: Presents conception of the duct confluence number and system economics number.
sentences.chinese: 提出了风管合流数和系统经济数的概念。

sentences.english: Chapter four discusses the confluence of the bureaucratic group and social forces in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 第四章讨论官僚集团与社会势力的合流。

sentences.english: It emerges from a confluence of factors, some very subtle.
sentences.chinese: 它浮现于多因子的合流，非常微妙的。

sentences.english: It was triggered by a confluence of flaky rumours.
sentences.chinese: 抢盐恐慌由片状谣言合流而引发。

sentences.english: Using drainage canals in combined system to treat sewage is a new technology.
sentences.chinese: 利用合流制排水沟渠处理污水是一项新技术。

sentences.english: Thirdly, the chapter fictions had a current of confluent north and south.
sentences.chinese: 其三，19世纪中后期，章回小说有南北合流的趋势。

sentences.english: The characters of series process are suitable for the confluence desilication.
sentences.chinese: 串联法的工艺特点，更宜于采用合流脱硅。

sentences.english: We had converged with Western Europe to the mixed economy.
sentences.chinese: 我们和西欧一起合流成为混合经济。

sentences.english: The Yongding and Daqing rivers meet near Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 永定河和大清河在天津附近合流。
